channel.title: [Delta] Some things [317]
channel.description:
I have two things I would like some help with.
#1 - All my logs look like Magic Logs
#2 - Karils X-Bow doesn't hit on npcs but gives the XP
-Pblord7

item.title: [Delta] Some things [317]
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

[quote=“Ironclad722, post:5, topic:376664”][quote author=KoF link=topic=472588.msg3456892#msg3456892 date=1294100883]
find this in your client.java

case 5904:

now you will see:

case 5904: // Dead Tree pEmote = 0x284; woodcutting[0] = 1; woodcutting[1] = 1; woodcutting[2] = 25; woodcutting[4] = 1511; break;

woodcutting[4] are the logs : item id of logs are 1511 , if there stand 1513 it are magic logs. so change to 1511 and do it for all other trees
use your item.cfg to see item ID from the logs

hope this helps you

other info
woodcutting[2] are the exp from that tree

grts,
Mr Tekkah
[/quote]

No, no no and NO! Don’t use Delta’s shitty woodcutting methods!

Kid, just use this one:
http://www.r/une-serve/r.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/266471-317-100-woodcutting-your-server-sounds.html

just remove the / n rune and server[/quote]
thanx maybe soon i update my woodcutting :d

Read full topic

find this in your client.java

case 5904:

now you will see:

case 5904: // Dead Tree pEmote = 0x284; woodcutting[0] = 1; woodcutting[1] = 1; woodcutting[2] = 25; woodcutting[4] = 1511; break;

item.title: [Delta] Some things [317]
item.dc:creator: @Ironclad722 Ironclad722
item.description:
@Ironclad722 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:376664”]1. Your models are probably messed.

  1. Some servers have it so once you get karils bow it doesn’t do damage; And it’s just for training range. Easy fix though. Use another bow as an example.[/quote]

Thats some basic info, you might wanna actually tell him something useful? maybe that when he cuts wood that it just gives him magic logs?

And also, heres a simple code for adding damage…

if (UseBow && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) { //CalculateRange(); hitDiff = npcRangeDamage(); if (DeleteArrow() && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 4740) { actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else { ResetAttackNPC(); sM("You're out of bolts!"); return false; } }
NOTE: that is just a basic generated code for you to work off of.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Some things [317]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

  1. Your models are probably messed.

  2. Some servers have it so once you get karils bow it doesn’t do damage; And it’s just for training range. Easy fix though. Use another bow as an example.
